Text.Page:
Thulsa sure doesn't like to fight his own battles, does he? Always getting someone, willing or otherwise, to do his dirty work for him.

We've located the draelkar pylon northeast of here. It's guarded by Sihranars. Be careful, and you'll do just fine.

Excellent!

Glad I could count on you. With the pylon destroyed, the creatures should slowly get back to normal.

It won't make the arachnens and barsicores any fuzzier toward us, but it's a start.
